Rental Agreement

This Equipment rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is effective as of the date of signature, and is made between NHK MEDICAL PRIVATE LIMITED and {{ doc.customer_name }} (“Renter”). Owner and Renter are hereinafter collectively referred to as “Parties”.

Owner rents the Renter and Renter rents from Owner, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement: Medical Equipment described on receipt/invoice:

1 . Term: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and remain in full force and effect until Equipment is returned to Owner.

2 . Payment: Renter shall pay the following:

    {% set ns = namespace(total_rate=0) %} {% for item in doc.items %} {% set ns.total_rate = ns.total_rate + item.rate %} {% endfor %}
  1. Rs. {{ ns.total_rate | round(2) }} per day for a total of {{ doc.total_no_of_dates }} days;
  2. Charges for optional services or cleaning, if any;
  3. Applicable taxes;
    4. {% for item in doc.items %}
  4. A charge of Rs.{{ item.rate }} per day for late return of the device {{ item.item_name }} ({{ item.item_code }}).
    5. {% endfor %}
  5. If any damage happened to the equipment then the renter should pay the actual cost of the product.

3 . Security Deposit: Renter shall pay a deposit which is 50% of the actual equipment amount. Owner may use the deposit to cover any amounts due under this agreement.

4 . Late Payment: The renter should pay the rental payment every month on the 2nd day according to the English calendar. If fails to do the same then everyday it will increase by Rs. 250/-(Two Hundred Fifty Only) as fine with the actual rent amount.

5 . Location of Equipment: During the term, _________

6 . Care of Equipment: Equipment can only be used in a careful and proper manner and shall not be used in any way that is inconsistent with the Owner’s instruction or manual.

7 . Repair and Alterations: Equipment shall not be services or repaired and parts and accessories shall not be replaced without Owner’s prior consent.

8 . Loss or Damages: Renter shall be responsible for any loss or damage to equipment.

9 . Condition of Equipment: The Renter should return the item with proper way and the Owner should examine the equipment, after that inspection the Owner will decide whether the product is acceptable or any damages happened to that product. If any damages happened then the Owner will not provide any security deposit.

Return of Equipment: Renter shall return the equipment on the date specified under this agreement.

10 . Termination: This agreement shall terminate if the renter is not paying the rent for two months. Then it’s the right of the owner to terminate the agreement and request the renter for return of that particular product.

11 . Details of the Rent Equipment:

Equipment details in brief:

{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Equipment Name Equipment Serial No. Customer name Starts from Ends on Monthly rent
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ doc.customer_name }} {{ doc.start_date }} {{ doc.end_date }} {{ item.line_total }}

Payment received/not received : {{ doc.payment_status }}

Period Rate of Rent (Rs.)
{{doc.start_date}} to {{doc.end_date}} Rs. {{doc.rounded_total}}/- .

I (Renter) accept all the terms and conditions written in this agreement and I am aware of those things contains in this agreement. If anything goes wrong which is violation of this agreement then I pay all the charges/fees contained in paragraphs.

COMPANY NAME:

SIGNATURE OF THE SENIOR MANAGER:
